channel.title: 667+ command teleporting question

item.title: 667+ command teleporting question
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

why everytime i teleport it’s like randomized, i want to make it so when the player types the command it sends them to the EXACT coord. here’s what i got,

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("cage")) { Magic.sendNormalTeleportSpell(player, 0, 0, new WorldTile(2606, 3105, 0)); return true; }

That’s too make them go into the cage in yanille, but it just teleports the players around the cage, help appreciated thanks

Read full topic
